runs.comm: nice start, pushes a full ball off the meat of the bat straight to mid-off
gets off the mark with a gentle clip wide of mid-on and midwicket, still keeps it full

risky shot! It was sightly short and wide and he reached out and thumped it, Dilshan did brilliantly at backward point to throw himself to his left and get a hand to it, would have been a stunning catch
it's short and he has a wild swing at it and Sangakkara appeals for a catch, don;t think he gloved that
smashed! Full and wide and he reaches out and thrashes it wide of cover, the ball bounces high above the infield and speeds away
drifts on the pads and he tucks it just wide of square leg
gives him the charge and Kulasekara pitches it shorter and Nazir swings and ends up chopping it onto his pads
beaten! Kula bowls that stock inswinger and it nips back in and slices the batsman in half
street cricket slog from Nazir, the ball moves away from him and beats the batsman and the off stump, Hafeez comes across and has a word with him
this time he loses his direction and slides it wide down the leg side
yet another wide down the leg side, this one moved even more
intelligent shot by Nazir, there was no slip, he calmly opened the face of the bat and dabbed it wide of the keeper, Herath couldn't stop it at third man
nips back in and he gets across and taps it to the on side
risky running! He gets an inside edge on the defence and the ball rolls on the pitch, Hafeez takes off and Kula runs forward to pick up and underarm the throw, just wide of the stumps
good start by Malinga, slower ball and the batsman can only defend it
that was too far wide for any keeper to stop it, it slipped out of his hand and went wide down the leg side, trouble controlling the wet ball?
well played, this one bounced a bit more as he came forward and the ball hit the handle and went past the keeper
slower delivery and he comes forward and across and pushes it to cover
confident appeal for an lbw! The off cutter and the batsman was forward to flick it away and the ball hits the pads but down the leg side, Taufel shakes his head
the off cutter again, once again he's hit on the pads and was far too high
ends the over with another off cutter, this time it brushes the pad and rolls to the keeper who does well to slide and cut it off
beaten on the loose drive, didn't move his feet and he was trying to cut it away square
Kula keeps him quiet with another in dipper, he gets across and defends
comes back in and he heaves it away across the line to deep square leg, didn't look much in control of that shot
slower delivery and he swivels at the crease and pulls along the turf and deep square leg mops up
Hafeez goes right across his stumps and attempts a lap shot, that missed the leg stump and Kula and Sanga appealed for a catch behind, the umpire Tucker didn't think it was wide enough to be called
another heave and a miss, like gully cricket, this was outside the off stump,played too early
on the pads and gently clipped away to the leg side
stabbed at it towards point and the fielder did really well to fling himself to his left and get a hand to it
these slower balls are keeping them quiet, bounced a bit more too as it beat the bat, Hafeez tries to dab it away
beaten again! Yet another off cutter and Haffez is beaten as he tries to steer it away
slower ball and on the pads, he fails to put it away and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
fires that fuller and he comes well forward and defends, ends a really good over
makes himself room and he punches it to the off side
tries to slog and the ball hits his thigh and there's a half hearted
scintillating fielding by Dilshan at extra cover! Haffez was down the track and he crashed that, could well have been a boundary
heaved away to the on side and mistimed, had to hurry the single, throw was wide
down the leg side and he sweeps it away and beats the diving short fine leg, Malinga the fielder
it rolls back to the stumps! Nazir was forward to defend and the ball edged to his pads and rolled over to hit the off and middle stumps
that should make up for his scratchiness, lovely shot, pitched up and punched on the front foot and it's in the air for a bit but safe of long-on
Dropped Tough chance for Herath, Hafeez lofted it down the ground and Herath ran to his left from long-on and jumped and tried to catch it one-handed, it bounced out of his hand
swings at it outside the off stump and misses, seen a few of those today
beaten again! This one nips back in and goes past the under edge and sangakkara has to dive to stop it
appeal for a run out, Hafeez pushes it towards mid-off and has to hurry the single, the throw is to the bowler who whips off the bails, Hafeez is home
punches it to the off side for a single, sweeper rather
comes forward and pushes it to the bowler with soft hands
gets forward and safely tucks it wide of midwicket
tries to play a late cut and the leg cutter turns and bounces and beats him, no slip in place
slogged towards wide long-on and Malinga has to hurry and stop it, he fumbles and the ball nearly deflects to the rope
chopped towards the off side and they take a quick single
lovely shot to end the over! Hafeez made a bit of room and lofted that easily over extra cover inside out,  bisected two fielders at the deep

appeal for an lbw! Round the wicket line, pitches a shade outside leg and hit the pads and rlled to the off side, they pick up a run, Herath wasn;t behind the stumps for the throw or else Jamshed would have been run out
down the track and he drives in the air down to long-on
tossed up and clipped to the on side
tucked away down to Malinga at short fine leg and they take a quick single
Hafeez made room and sliced it square on the off side, picks the gap and a second run
slogs him along the turf and Mathews slides at deep midwicket and throws, his throw is not the strongest

the bowling change works! Mathews bowls the slower ball, the off cutter, Jamshed is trapped at the crease and he half heartedly tries to tuck it away, the umpire Tucker reckoned that was hitting the off stump. But hang on - replays showed the ball pitching outside leg! Well
gets off the mark with a single wide of mid-on
nicely driven on the up wide of extra cover

no doubts about the credibility of this dismissal! Soft dismissal, looked like the slower ball again, Akmal tried to chip it over the in field and it tamely lobbed up to Mahela at short midwicket, he was too early on the shot
beaten on the drive and it creeps underneath the bat
gets off the mark with a steer to deep point
comes well forward and clips it wide of mid-on
made room and deliberately dabbed down to short third man, picks up a quick single
makes room and lofts inside out down to wide long-off, well stopped by Kula
risks playing it very late and he steers it to the off side
no slip in place and he nicely steers it wide of short third man
Malik was well and truly squared up! Full credit to Herath here, it turned from off and middle and completely beat Malik on the drive, pegged back the off stump and the Sri Lankans are thrilled
Dropped! Malinga has let go of a sitter! Hafeez tamely chipped it in the air down to long-on, Malinga was comfortably underneath it and yet he managed to fluff it
pushes it down to cover point
didn't look like it was going for a four initially, it was pulled along the turf in front of square and the ball picked up speed, the fielder dived and parried it to the rope
good length outside off and pushed towards point
drives on the up wide of point for a single
shot of intent there! The reverse sweep this time, fetches that from middle and he reverse sweeps high over the infield
floated on middle and off and defended
six more! Tossed up and he was down the track and lofted it high and Kulasekara was a bit too far forward from the long-off rope, leaped and got a finger to it but the ball went over the rope
jams out a full delivery wide of the bowler who dives
pushes it down to long-off for a single
quicker delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
Mendis returns for a new spell, turns away and beats the batsman as he tries to cut
the shot Umar was trying the previous ball, spun away and he nicely guided it wide of backward point
tucked away off the pads towards square leg
goes back and pushes it to long-off
booming extra cover drive but the fielder dives and gets a hand to it, saved a couple there
comes well forward and blocks it out
and he's stumped! Tossed up and he was down the track and the ball kept a bit low and Sanga whipped off the bails

And it's yet another golden duck for Afridi! He didn't read the carom ball at all! He stayed at the crease and tamely chopped it onto his stumps, this comes in the 16th anniversary of his fastest century, off 37 balls
comes forward and blocks out the hat-trick ball
comes forward and blocks it out
shuffles and clips it to the on side
short of a length and he chops it down to point
opens the face and steers it down to third man
tucked away to the leg side and Malinga fumbles as he runs forward to pick up, they take a second run
just chipped over the infield! Akmal gives him the charge and lofts a length delivery just over extra cover's reach, four welcome runs
full on the pads and he works it away down to square leg
slower ball and he easily steers it wide of point
picks the slower ball from Malinga, fetches that from outside the off stump and lofts over midwicket, the fielder in the deep runs a long way and cannot stop it
Full delivery and he pushes it down to long-off
Fires that on a Yorker length outside off and he reaches out and fails to dig it out
Pushes it down to sweeper cover
clips it wide of short midwicket for a couple
comes down the track and he chips it over point for a couple
we have yet another stumping! The off break this time, pitched it shorter on seeing the batsman give the charge, easy stumping
you will be forgiven for thinking this is a Test match, Gul calmly leaves it alone to the keeper
and he calmly defends this one, Pakistan are running out of balls here

appeal for a run out! Akmal squirted a full delivery straight to backward point, Mahela fires the throw to the bowler, Malinga is not behind the stumps and as a result he has to stretch quite far to dislodge the bails, Gul scampers to his crease, Malinga under arms the ball to the stumps and when the ball made contact with the stumps Gul had not yet grounded his bat  but the bails weren't off the groove, third umpire takes a long time and gives Gul the benefit
squirted out straight to backward point again and only a single
fails to dig out a yorker and Pakistan cannot sneak in a bye to give Akmal the strike
this was sprayed too wide outside the off stump, he couldn't dig out the yorker
beaten on the drive, Malinga doing well not to bowl length to Gul, the fast yorker was too good for him
fullish in length and he swings and digs it out to the on side
full and wide outside off and he crashes it straight to sweeper, ends an excellent bowling display by Malinga, he's had a horror time in the field but he's delivered with the ball
the slower ball from the back of the hand it squirted to midwicket, Akmal turns down the single!
bowls it straight outside off and he has a wild swing at it and misses it completely
can't put this away for six! Full outside off and driven down to the sweeper
full on the stumps and pounded down the ground to long-on, just a single gentlemen
makes room and slices it over point with one hand
full outside the off stump and drilled straight to cover and Sri Lanka are through to the finals!
